author: Maria Armental
title: Symantec Discloses Internal Investigation
text:
Cybersecurity company Symantec Corp. is looking into unspecified financial issues and warned it may have to amend financial results and guidance and will likely miss a regulatory deadline.
The disclosure, which offered few details and was tucked into its fourth-quarter earnings release, sent shares down 19% to $23.54 in after-hours trading.
